HediffDef.label: cryptosleep sickness
HediffDef.description: After-effects of using a cryptosleep pod. Cryptosleep suspends and replaces many bodily functions in order to prevent aging and death. Upon exiting cryptosleep, the body takes time to restart and rebalance its natural metabolic processes. While this is ongoing, the patient suffers from nausea, dizziness, and a sense of fuzziness in the mind.

HediffDef.label: EMP shock
HediffDef.description: After-effects of an electrical shock to the automaton. This is generally cause by feedback from automaton hit by EMP pulses.
